    • Uses of Restriction in businessmodel.restrictions

      Subclasses of Restriction in businessmodel.restrictions 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultMandatoryOptionRestriction
      Class representing a restriction that checks the default mandatory options.
      class  MultipleCategoryRestriction
      A class representing a restriction that checks for multiple categories.
      class  SportBodyRestriction
      A class representing a restriction that checks for the mandatory options and categories for a set of options with a sport body.

      A class representing a restriction that checks for the mandatory options and categories for a set of options with an ultra engine.
